topic.title: Import MODFLOW 6 Feature Modified by PEST Dialog Box

para.text: Import MODFLOW 6 Feature Modified by PEST Dialog Box
Import MODFLOW 6 Feature Modified by PEST
dialog box is used to import data sets representing boundary conditions modified by PEST so that they can be visualized. The dialog box is displayed by selecting
File|Import MODFLOW 6 Features Modified by PEST
. In the dialog box, the user selects a MODFLOW 6 boundary condition file for the current model and the stress period for which information is desired.
